p: During March 2020, the number of patients with olfactory dysfunction was increased in different provinces of Iran, concurrent with COVID-19 epidemic. Thus, we decided to assess the prevalence of this olfactory dysfunction disorder by an online questionnaire in this population-based study. The results of this study showed a widespread olfactory dysfunction all over the country. Also, a significant linear correlation between prevalence of COVID-19 and olfactory impairment that was published online on March 27, 2020 ( 11).
